fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Education and training, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
- Civil law rules on robotics 
- DG CNECT expert group on Artificial Intelligence

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Robotise is a young company that carries out its commercial activities in the development, production and marketing of autonomous service robots among others with a focus on elderly care homes, hospitals as well as commercial and industrial settings, including the hotel and entertainment industry (hospitality industry).
